description: This object indicates an AP upgrade start alarm..
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateBeginTrap HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApMac s EXAMPL HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApId u 9999

description: This object indicates the AP name.
variables.name: HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApName

description: This object indicates the MAC address of an AP.
variables.name: HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApMac

description: This object indicates the upgrade result alarm.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateResultTrap HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateResult i 3 HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApMac s EXAMPL HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateTime s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateByFileName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateNextOper i 1 HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateResultStatus s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApId u 9999

$SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateResultTrap HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateResult i 1 HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApMac s EXAMPL HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateTime s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateByFileName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateNextOper i 1 HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateResultStatus s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApId u 9999

description: This object indicates the AP name.
variables.name: HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApName

description: This object indicates the MAC address of an AP.
variables.name: HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApMac

description: This object indicates that the Uboot version does not match the AP version.

event.Summary: Uboot version not matched AP version

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-UPDATE-MIB::hwWlanApUpdateUbootNotMatchTrap HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApMac s EXAMPL HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApId u 9999

description: This object indicates the AP name.
variables.name: HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApName

description: This object indicates the MAC address of an AP.
variables.name: HUAWEI-WLAN-AP-MIB::hwWlanApMac
